title: Windeler Cycle Stak Tool
content:
Windeler, makers of EDC tools and knives, completely updated its Cycle Stak tool with a new DT01 ratchet driver and redesigned CS02 chain tool. This new Cycle Stak tool weighs 95 grams and is 17.5 mm thick. It maintains Windeler’s signature minimal design while offering even more functionality and adaptability in a compact package.

Product Details

  • Early bird pricing (30% off) $109
  • Modular tools: Every tool contains Windeler’s Polnetik™ connector
  • Corrosion resistant: Aluminium and 316 Marine grade stainless steel
  • Easy to clean: Simply pull them apart, wipe them down or wash them off
  • No more jamming multitools: Windeler’s system prevents jamming mechanisms
  • DT01 Ratchet driver + CS02 Chain tool
  • Weight: 95 g
  • Thickness: 17.5 mm
  • Materials: Hard anodized 6061 Aluminium, 316 stainless steel, carbon-infused PC, and tool steel

 

You can save 30% off on the Cycle Stak with special pre-order pricing now at Windemer.

The post Windeler Cycle Stak Tool appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
